snippet: Rebels whose revolt last year split Mali signed a peace deal with the government, resolving a stumbling block to the West African nation’s reconstruction.
abstract: Rebels of Tuareg ethnic group, whose 2012 revolt in northern Mali split nation, sign peace deal with government, resolving stumbling block to country's reconstruction and elections.
lead_paragraph: Rebels whose revolt last year split Mali signed a peace deal with the government, resolving a stumbling block to the West African nation’s reconstruction.

headline.main: Rebels in North Mali Sign Peace Deal Allowing In Government Troops
headline.print_headline: Rebels in North Mali Sign Peace Deal Allowing In Government Troops
